update t_repay_plan
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERIOD = #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REPAY_CAPITAL = #{repayCapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
REPAY_INTEREST = #{repayInterest,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
VALUE_DATE = #{valueDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CLOSING_DATE = #{closingDate,jdbcType=DATE},
REMAIN_CAPITAL = #{remainCapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
REPAY_TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{repayTotalAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ADDUP_OVERDUE_DAY = #{addupOverdueDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADDUP_OVERDUE_AMOUNT = #{addupOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
REPAY_STATUS = #{repayStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLE_MODE = #{settleMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLE_DATE = #{settleDate,jdbcType=DATE},
RESERVER1 = #{reserver1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVER2 = #{reserver2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVER3 = #{reserver3,jdbcType=DATE},
RESERVER4 = #{reserver4,jdbcType=DATE},
RESERVER5 = #{reserver5,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
RESERVER6 = #{reserver6,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
